scenario.name: Sipwise NGCP Benchmark UAC Caller
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[field1 file="callee.csv" line=0]@[field3 file="callee.csv" line=0] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[field0 file="caller.csv" line=0]@[field2 file="caller.csv" line=0]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: <sip:[field1 file="callee.csv" line=0]@[field3 file="callee.csv" line=0]> Call-ID: NGCP%[field4 file="callee.csv" line=0]%///[call_id] CSeq: 1 INVITE Contact: sip:[field0 file="caller.csv" line=0]@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000 a=ptime:50

CANCEL sip:[field1 file="callee.csv" line=0]@[field3 file="callee.csv" line=0]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 [last_Via:] From: <sip:[field0 file="caller.csv" line=0]@[field2 file="caller.csv" line=0]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: <sip:[field1 file="callee.csv" line=0]@[field3 file="callee.csv" line=0]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: NGCP%[field4 file="callee.csv" line=0]%///[call_id] CSeq: 1 CANCEL Content-Length: [len]
ACK sip:[field1 file="callee.csv" line=0]@[field3 file="callee.csv" line=0]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 [last_Via:] [last_From:] [last_To:] [last_Call-ID:] [last_CSeq:] Content-Length: 0
ACK sip:[field1 file="callee.csv" line=0]@[field3 file="callee.csv" line=0]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 [last_Via:] [last_From:] [last_To:] [last_Call-ID:] [last_CSeq:] Content-Length: 0
